c74object.name: sp.concatmatch
c74object.digest: Find the nearest match in a pre-analyzed corpus
c74object.description: Find the nearest match in a pre-analyzed concat corpus.

discussion.p: The sp.concatmatch object works in conjunction with sp.concatanalysis~ and sp.concatplayer~ to create real-time audio mosaicking via concatatenative synthesis with a pre-analyzed concat corpus. sp.concatmatch handles the nearest neighbor matching.

inlet.description: Takes incoming buffer~ name to find the nearest entry. Also takes the messages for object control.

outlet.description: The nearest entry in the pre-trained concat corpus.

outlet.digest: Position and name outlet for waveform~
outlet.description: Sends the buffer~ name and playback position to be used with waveform~.
